data.text:
Adam Berry | Composer News

White Sun Wins GRAMMY® for Mystic Mirror

On February 5, 2023, the Recording Academy awarded White Sun a GRAMMY® for the album "Mystic Mirror" in the category of Best New Age, Ambient or Chant Album. This is the band's second Grammy.

→ LISTEN TO ALBUM

Adam Scores Dreams Quest

Adam is writing music for the new immersive fantasy game 'Dreams Quest."

Adam to Score New Lost in Oz Film

The Bureau of Magic has announced a new Lost in Oz film that picks up where the Amazon episodic left off. Adam wrote the music for the critically acclaimed, Emmy Award winning series and will score the film as well.

→ Watch the Trailer

White Sun Nominated for a GRAMMY®

The newest album from White Sun, “Mystic Mirror,” has been nominated for a GRAMMY® in the category of Best New Age, Ambient or Chant Album. This is White Sun’s second Grammy nomination. The band (Gurujas, Harijiwan and Adam Berry) was nominated for and subsequently won the Grammy in 2017 for their album “White Sun II.” Mystic Mirror was released on September 23, 2022 and has reached #1 on the iTunes Worldwide chart in five countries including the US.

→ Watch Video

Adam Scores Tom Schulman Film 'Double Down South'

Adam has scored the latest film from Academy Award winning writer and director, Tom Schulman (Dead Poet’s Society, What About Bob.) Double Down South is a shadowy confidence-game thriller set in the South, and Adam’s moody, blues and bluegrass-infused score highlights both the film's swampy location and the tense, engrossing story.

→ Read More

White Sun Receives Billboard Plaques on the 6th Anniversary of their First Album

'White Sun' by White Sun was released six years ago. Since then the band has released four albums, 100+ tracks and won a Grammy. All of their albums have charted on Billboard, and two albums, White Sun II and White Sun III, have made it to number 1.

Adam is a member of White Sun and producer for the band.

'Good Trouble' Features Music by White Sun

The latest episode of the Freeform/Hulu show 'Good Trouble' features two tracks by White Sun, 'Chattra Chakkra Varti' from their Grammy winning album 'White Sun II' and the instrumental 'White Sun Drums.' The episode, titled 'New Moon', airs on March 31, 2021 at 10pm PST. Both tracks were produced by Adam Berry.

Adam Co-Writes and Produces Song Performed by Jennifer Lewis on Big Hero 6

Jennifer Lewis performs the disco-inspired track 'Stay Strong' on Big Hero 6 episode 'Krei-Oke,' which premieres this month. Lewis voices recurring character Professor Granville but this is her first time lending her diva vocals to the show. The musical episode features seven songs performed by cast members, music by Adam Berry, lyrics by Bob Schooley and Mark McCorkle.

→ 'Stay Strong' on YouTube

Adam Co-Writes and Produces Two Songs for Big Hero 6 Guest Stars Nichkhun and Jae Park

Kpop stars Nichkhun of 2PM and Jae Park of Day6 guest star on the Big Hero 6 episode 'Big Hero Battle.' The duo performs two original songs on the show, 'Beautiful on the Outside' and '4-2-Sing,' music by Adam Berry, lyrics by Mark McCorkle and Bob Schooley.

→ 'Beautiful on the Outside' on YouTube

Adam Berry is nominated for an Emmy Award in the category of Outstanding Orginal Song for his work on Disney's Big Hero 6. Adam has previously won an Emmy in this category, as well as in the category of Outstanding Score. This is his 10th Emmy nomination.

White Sun II hit #1 on Billboard's New Age Chart and #2 on Billboard's World Chart.

White Sun Album Hits #10 on Billboard World Music Chart

White Sun's debut album, produced by Adam Berry, reached number ten on Billboard's World Music chart in the first week of its release.

Adam Berry Produces Album with White Sun

Adam produced and performed on White Sun's debut album, titled 'White Sun.' The band White Sun was formed in 2015 and is singer/ songwriter Gurujas Khalsa, percussionist and band founder Harijiwan Khalsa, and producer, guitarist and keyboardist Adam Berry. Within hours of the album's pre-release it hit #1 on iTunes' World Music chart.

→ Order the album on itunes

Adam Receives 8th Emmy Nomination

Nominations for the 40th annual Daytime Emmy awards were announced this morning, and Adam once again recieved a nomination for Outstanding Achievement in Music Direction and Composition for his work on Penguins of Madagascar. This is his eighth Emmy nomination, having recieved nominations in 2005, 2010, 2011 and 2012 with wins in 2011 and 2012.

Adam Scores Dreamworks / Nickelodeon's Monsters vs Aliens

Adam is scoring the new series Monsters vs Aliens, based on the Dreamworks feature film. The series premieres April 6, 2013 on Nickelodeon with a special sneak peak Saturday, March 23, 2013 at 9:30pm.

→ Monsters vs Aliens Press release

Adam Nominated for Four Emmy Awards

Today the National Academy of Television Arts & Sciences announced the nominees for the 39th annual Daytime Emmy Awards. Adam has been nominated for four awards for his work on The Penguins of Madagascar, including one for OUTSTANDING ACHIEVEMENT IN MUSIC DIRECTION AND COMPOSITION and two for OUTSTANDING ORIGINAL SONG. Overall the show received eight nominations.

Adam wins Emmy Award

Last night the Academy of Television Arts and Sciences awarded Adam a Daytime Emmy Award for OUTSTANDING ACHIEVEMENT IN MUSIC DIRECTION AND COMPOSITION for his original music for The Penguins of Madagascar. The program won a total of six Emmy Awards.

Adam receives BMI Award

This month BMI held its annual Film/TV Awards at The Beverly Wilshire hotel. Adam received a BMI award for his work on The Penguins of Madagascar.

Adam nominated for Emmy Award

Adam has once again been nominated for a Daytime Emmy award for OUTSTANDING ACHIEVEMENT IN MUSIC DIRECTION AND COMPOSITION for his original work on The Penguins of Madagascar. This is his third Emmy nomination.

Penguins of Madagascar wins Emmy Award

Last night the Academy of Television Arts and Sciences awarded the producers of The Penguins of Madagascar a Daytime Emmy Award for OUTSTANDING SPECIAL CLASS ANIMATED PROGRAM. The program was also nominated for outstanding direction, writing and music.

Adam nominated for an Emmy Award

Adam has been nominated for a Daytime Emmy award for OUTSTANDING ACHIEVEMENT IN MUSIC DIRECTION AND COMPOSITION for his original work on The Penguins of Madagascar. This is his second Emmy nomination, he was first nominated in 2005 for his work on Kim Possible.

Adam Berry appears on Comedy Central's 'The Sarah Silverman Program'

Adam plays a keyboardist on the latest episode of The Sarah Silverman Program. The episode airs on March 25, 2010 on Comedy Central.

Penguins of Madagascar wins Golden Reel Award

The MPSE (Motion Picture Sound Editors) awarded the sound editors of The Penguins of Madagascar a Golden Reel Award for best Sound Editing: sound effects, foley, music, dialogue and ADR.

The Great Schlep wins Black Pencil Award

Sarah Silverman's brilliant political entreaty, featuring music by Adam, wins the Black Pencil Award from D&AD, a British organization that promotes the very best of design around the world.

→ Read More

Penguins of Madagascar Sets the Record as Most-Watched Premiere

Dreamworks/Nickelodeon series 'The Penguins of Madagascar' had its official premiere on March 29, 2009, drawing 6.1 million viewers and setting the record for most-watched premiere on Nickelodeon. Music by Adam Berry.
